==About RSSOwl 2.2.1==

{{images/RSSOwl.png}}
==Features of RSSOwl 2.2.1==
# Used on all major platforms like Windows, Linux (32 Bit and 64 Bit) and Apple Mac OS X.
# Easy to keep your list of subscriptions and articles synchronized with your Google Reader account. 
# Display news feeds side by side in multiple tabs.
# Use the embedded Browser to open the full content of a news entry from the originating web site.
# Switch to the newspaper view to get the full content of a feed displayed at once inside the embedded browser.
# Select from one of the keyword feeds to receive news from a specific topic of your interest.
# With the help of the Clean-Up Wizard you can easily get rid of old news entries or feeds that have not updated in a while. 
# You can easily customize the toolbar in RSSOwl to make actions you commonly use easy to access with a single click. 
# RSSOwl supports a wide range of features that make RSSOwl accessible.
